headline: Bunge Limited Finance Corp. Announces Extension of Exchange Offers
summary: ST. LOUIS, January 31, 2025--Bunge Global SA (NYSE: BG) ("Bunge"), today announced that its wholly-owned subsidiary, Bunge Limited Finance Corp. ("BLFC"), has further extended the expiration date of its previously announced (A) offers to exchange (each an "Exchange Offer" and, collectively the "Exchange Offers") any and all outstanding 2.000% Notes due 2026 (the "Existing Viterra 2026 Notes"), 4.900% Notes due 2027 (the "Existing Viterra 2027 Notes"), 3.200% Notes due 2031 (the "Existing Viterra
